author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kapsch Trafficcom AG 9Mth Revenue Increase Of 7.5% To EUR 506.9 Million
text:
Kapsch Trafficcom Ag:
* 9MTH REVENUE INCREASE OF 7.5% TO EUR 506.9 MILLION * 9-MONTH EBIT OF EUR 35.3 MILLION WAS EUR 7.7 MILLION (-17.8%)
* PROFIT FOR FIRST THREE QUARTERS 2017/18 AMOUNTED TO EUR 22.9 MILLION (Q1-Q3 2016/17: EUR 29.4 MILLION)
* ‍EXPECTS A DYNAMIC Q4, IN WHICH REVENUE WILL INCREASE ONCE AGAIN AS COMPARED TO PREVIOUS YEAR​
* CONTINUES TO BE GOAL TO REACH AGAIN EBIT OF PAST YEAR - ADJUSTED FOR ONE-OFF EFFECT (EUR 3.0 MILLION) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
